hasDitaContent.@value: Fingolimod might increase the risk of QT-prolongation when given with sotalol. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Fingolimod   might   increase   the risk of QT-prolongation when given with   sotalol .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: St John's wort is predicted to decrease the exposure to fingolimod. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: St John's wort   is predicted to   decrease   the exposure to   fingolimod .  Manufacturer advises avoid .
